titles.title: National Park Second Amendment Restoration and Personal Protection Act of 2006
A bill to protect the second amendment rights of individuals to carry firearms in units of the National Park System.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 11/16/2006--Introduced. National Park Second Amendment Restoration and Personal Protection Act of 2006 - Permits the possession or carrying of firearms in units of the National Park System.
